name: Battle Bees
description:
This is the result of my first ever game-jam. 

I completed 90% of this during the 48 hours of ludum dare, in Oct. 2020, and spend a little bit more time polishing everything up & adding little details here and there. 

This was made just for fun, and is a super short bullet-hell style sidescroller game where you play as a bee shooting down flies, wasps & spiders!

I had no intention of trying to follow the Ludum Dare theme or prompt, I mainly just wanted to see if I could even complete a game in such a short time. I'm still very new to gamedev, but am very excited to make more!

Music provided by producer RoboRob & used with permission. Sound effects are open source.
